tool_description: This  APIs and Services from the web to do just one thing... send cat facts.
name: Daily Cat Facts
title: Daily Cat Facts

api_list.name: Get some random facts

optional_parameters.name: animal_type
optional_parameters.description: Type of animal the fact will describe . Default : \"cat\"

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description:
Number of Facts to retrieve. If set to one, response will be a fact object. If many, response will be an array of Facts . 
Default : 1.
Limit : 500.
